participant_1.background:
I practice music and do some meditation to calm my nerves before my first day of safety patrol.
My relationship is going strong, even though my family doesn't approve.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.
I'm not much of a fashion plate but I love my moped and my pickled eggs.
My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it.

participant_2.background:
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.
i currently suffer from social anxiety.
I enjoy spending my weekends training with edged weapons and reading about mountaineering.
i am a fourteen year old living with my mom and grandparents.
my hair is long and blonde.

content.text: Hi, I'm a big fan of Game of Thrones. What did you think of the new season?
It was so good! I'm so excited to see what happens next.
Me too! I love how the show is so unpredictable.
Right? I'm always on the edge of my seat.
What's your favorite part of the show?
I love all the different characters. They're all so complex and interesting.
Me too! I love trying to figure out what their motivations are.
Yeah, it's so much fun to analyze the show.
I'm glad you're a fan too! I don't know anyone else who watches it.
Me neither! It's nice to meet someone who's into it.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I like to read and write. I'm also trying to learn how to play the guitar.
That's awesome! I love to read too. I'm not very good at guitar, but I like to play it.
Well, it's good to have hobbies. They make life more interesting.
Yeah, I agree. I'm glad we met.
Me too! It's always nice to meet a fellow fan.
